title: Ticket #6195: Job Router crash on error reading job_queue.log
description:
The Job Router can crash when it has trouble reading the schedd's job_queue.log file. This is due to fclose() being called twice on the same FILE struct. Reported by CERN.

The ClassAdLogReader object shares one FILE struct between two ClassAdLogParser objects. One parser checks whether the job log has grown or rotated, and the other reads the log events for processing. On certain errors reading the file, both parser objects will close the FILE struct.

I propose to modify ClassAdLogParser such that if it is given a FILE struct (instead of calling fopen() itself), it will not call fclose() on it. That will remove this double-close situation. I will make some further changes to reduce the chance for leaking open files when the caller isn't careful about calling closeFile() when necessary.
